examples: I read an interesting article in the newspaper.
She published an article in a prestigious journal.
The magazine features articles on various topics.
Eu li um artigo interessante no jornal.
Ela publicou um artigo em uma revista prestigiada.
A revista apresenta artigos sobre diversos temas.

suggested: Why did the grammarian refuse to eat the article? Because it wasn't properly punctuated!
Reading a heart-wrenching article about a tragic event can leave you feeling heavy-hearted.
I get so angry when I read biased articles that twist the truth for their own agenda.
Did you know that the word 'article' can refer to both a written composition and a specific grammatical element in a sentence?
The smell of fresh ink on the pages of a newly printed article.
The tactile experience of flipping through the pages of a magazine or newspaper to read an article.
Articles have the power to inform, educate, and connect people through shared knowledge and experiences.
